document.title: Register your ID
document.desc1: This procedure allows us to confirm your identity in order to guarantee the security of our platform.
document.desc2: This information is strictly confidential and is not shared.

listtype.title: Is your identification clearly visible?
listtype.label1: The photo must clearly show the front of your ID.
listtype.label2: It must not be blurred, reflective or cut off.
listtype.back: The photo must clearly show the back of your identification

upload.label1: Take a picture of the front of your ID card
upload.label2: Check that the lighting conditions are good
upload.label3: Position the front of your ID card
upload.label4: Make sure this one is in the white frame.
upload.back: Take a picture of the back of your ID.

verify.label1: Find a logo or an animation of a magnifying glass verifying an identity card
verify.label2: Please be patient : downloading the front of the ID in progress.
verify.back: Please be patient : downloading the back of the ID in progress.

confirm.label1: Verification of your ID is in progress
confirm.label2: We will validate it soon and contact you if necessary.
confirm.label3: Your profile confirmation has failed. Please provide another photo.
confirm.label4: We were unable to verify your identity with your photo ID. To help us confirm your identity, please add another photo.

verifypassport.label1: Take a picture of your passport
verifypassport.label2: Check that the lighting conditions are good
verifypassport.label3: Position the page with your passport photo on it.
verifypassport.label4: Make sure this one is in the white frame.

identification.title: Is your identification clearly visible?
identification.label1: The photo must clearly show the page of your passport with your ID.
identification.label2: It must not be blurred, reflective or cut off.

confirmationvisit.desc2: If your appointment is confirmed, you will receive an invitation with all the necessary information.

mydocument.desc: This procedure allows us to confirm your identity in order to guarantee the security of our platform. This information is strictly confidential and is not shared.

reservation.discoveractivities: Discover the activities in the area
reservation.cancellationfreeofcharge: Cancellation free of charge up to 48 hours. Withholding of 50% of the total amount within 48 hours.
reservation.changethedates: You can change the dates of arrival and departure of your stay as well as the number of travelers staying with you. If conditions allow it, you can also cancel your reservation.
reservation.has24hvalidaterequest: The host has 24 hours to validate your request.
reservation.emailthirdtraveller: E-mail address of the third traveller
reservation.sentemailconfirmationtraveller:
We have sent by email the confirmation of your reservation to the following address : %{param}
You can specify the email addresses of the persons accompanying you: they will receive an email confirming your reservation.
reservation.invitefriendcondition: If they are new to Moïen, we will offer them up to 25€ discount on their first booking and you will also receive 25€ discount on your next booking as part of your sponsorship (see terms and conditions).
reservation.modifymsg: Your reservation has been changed and is saved in the profile
reservation.createmsg: Reservation is saved in the profile
